Localization.Name: Escalate Stabilizer1
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: ArmaMod
Type: Energy Stabilizer
Attachment Point: Barrel
Size: 1

Aim Recoil: +50%
Visual Recoil: +50%
Fire Rate: +30%
Damage: -10%
Additional Burst Shots: +1

ArmaMod's enhanced circuitry in the Escalate Stabilizer1 boosts the output of handheld weapons substantially, trading control for power.
